column4: I accidently deleted my existing tray. and I don't see kopete on the cleaned one. I found network traffic and things like that but i don't know how to add kopete and programs like that
help please
hello. there's noone to help ?
rightclick on the panel and add to panel (add whatever you want)
there's no kopete on the list.
if its a custom application then use the custom application launcher
hmmm I found it but don't know where to find kopete. I am a beginner in the Gnome ;)
use the desktop search function to locate the binary
do you have any idea about my problem ?
subtitles?
what subtitles file are you using?
i'm not sure, just started using linux myself. What i would have done in windows would be to embed the file with nandub or use media player classic
i'm sure mencoder can do it somehow, but i don;t know unfortunately
thanks anyway
sorry can't help more, these are things i need to learn
have a look at some of the guides on doom9 they are helpful with this
doom9.com i think
I found the solution mate. thank you. there's a subtitle encoding part in Preferences of M Player. In case anyone else asks
send me a link please, will be useful to know
language of the page is turkish. I'll search for the english version
couldn't find. :( but it is very simple. Preferences > Subtitles & OSD > Encoding ;)
thanks, i'll lookinto it :)
